text:
Blue Mound is a city in Linn County, Kansas, United States. In 2010, 275 people lived there. It is part of the Kansas City metropolitan area.
History.
Blue Mound was planned out in 1882. It was named Blue Mound because from far away, its elevation is said to look blue.
Geography.
Blue Mound is at (38.090283, -95.008409). The United States Census Bureau, the city has a total area of. All of it is land.
2010 census.
The 2010 census says that there were 275 people, 111 households, and 75 families living in Blue Mound.
